Name: Barren
Description: At least of area 60% is non-vegetated barren (sand, rock, soil) or permanent snow/ice with less than 10% vegetation.

Name: Permanent Snow and Ice
Description: At least of area 60% is covered by snow and ice for at least 10 months of the year.

Name: Water Bodies
Description: At least 60% of area is covered by permanent water bodies.

Name: Evergreen Needleleaf Forests
Description: Dominated by evergreen conifer trees (>2m). Tree cover >60%.

Name: Evergreen Broadleaf Forests
Description: Dominated by evergreen broadleaf and palmate trees (>2m). Tree cover >60%.

Name: Deciduous Needleleaf Forests
Description: Dominated by deciduous needleleaf (larch) trees (>2m). Tree cover >60%.

Name: Deciduous Broadleaf Forests
Description: Dominated by deciduous broadleaf trees (>2m). Tree cover >60%.

Name: Mixed Broadleaf/Needleleaf Forests
Description: Co-dominated (40-60%) by broadleaf deciduous and evergreen needleleaf tree (>2m) types. Tree cover >60%.

Name: Mixed Broadleaf Evergreen/Deciduous Forests
Description: Co-dominated (40-60%) by broadleaf evergreen and deciduous tree (>2m) types. Tree cover >60%.

Name: Dense Herbaceous
Description: Dominated by herbaceous annuals (<2m) at least 60% cover.

Name: Shrubland/Grassland Mosaics
Description: Dominated by woody perennials (1-2m) 10-60% cover with dense herbaceous annual understory.

Name: Sparse Shrublands
Description: Dominated by woody perennials (1-2m) 10-60% cover with minimal herbaceous understory.

Name: Unclassified
Description: Has not received a map label because of missing inputs.
